participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Open-minded and friendly, enjoys sports and outdoor activities.
participant_1.background: i'm in an open polyamorous relationship. i've three dogs. i like to watch the olympics. my father was a door to door salesman. i also have a dog walking business.
